title: Video Cloud
description: A CLI that lets users generate word clouds from YouTube video captions

title: Meme Adviser
description: A reddit bot that analyzes the market at [r/MemeEconomy](https://www.reddit.com/r/MemeEconomy) and provides insightful information on investments

title: Mathu
description: An AI that adapts and grows to individual students' needs. Mathu came first place at the *Imagine Hackathon* in September 2018
